A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m a huge Star Wars fan and this was by far the most disappointing movie in the Star War series. It was the worst movie but it was such a let down. I felt that Disney did a really nice job with the Force Awakens which is why I had such high expectations. This film was all over the place. The story was very segmented and was hard to follow at times. There were portions of the film that I was excited to see in a Star Wars film (Imperial Guard especially). However\, I walked away feeling really bummed out by the let down. Thumbs down!!
